name: Yuval Goyal
description: Hey! I am **Yuval Goyal**, a 3rd year CSE student from IIT(BHU), Varanasi, India and go by the name of `kn1gh7` on the internet. I am the current Co-Lead of `IIT(BHU)CyberSec` along with [43H1](/authors/43H1) and [rasimhankunrava](/authors/rasimhankunrava). **Cybersecurity**, **Develepment** and **Low Level Programming** are my major interests. Hit me up if you have similiar interests. I blog about _stuff_ [here](https://0xkn1gh7.com).

name: Varalika Agarwal
description: Hey!! I am **Varalika Agarwal**, a sophomore studying Mathematics & Computing at IIT (BHU), Varanasi, India. I am passionate about learning new things and constantly striving to improve myself.
